tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
- Minimal to no waiting time
- Experienced and friendly Doctors
- Clear explanation of the procedure, Dos and Don'ts before/after the procedure
- Cleanly maintained Equipment, Hygienic Clinic and good soothing interiors
- Economical 
- Easy access from Arcot Road

I had my wisdom tooth removed in Sahas and followed all Doctor's advice for the coming week. Recovered in a week and back to becoming a foodie. First surgery in my life and thank you very much - Sahas, for making it a good one. 

Would highly recommend Dr. Jalal and Dr. Fathima for anyone with dental problems. ‚úåÔ∏è ‚úåÔ∏è

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had severe wisdom tooth pain in my left upper jaw. Just walked into Sahas dental clinic without any idea about the clinic and doctor. I met Dr.Jalal. He was very gentle, polite and he explained very clearly about the problem and the treatment too.  There was no other option left but to go for tooth extraction. He handled the procedure without any pain. I did not even realize the tooth has been extracted.  I recommend Dr. Jalal for your dental problems based on my experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
context: Teeth Straightening,Gap Closing,RCT - Single Sitting,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,
review:
I was recommended here by my neighbour.
The first time I came here for my son's braces i was highly impressed by the ambiance and hospitality provided.
Before I had so many complications in my tooth,but after visiting him everything has been resolved now I am having a bright smile üòä
I would highly recommend Dr.Jalal and Dr.Fathima,thank you for rectifying all my tooth problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Both the doctor are like gem to the doctor's society and the way they treat the patient and problems are excellent. Clinic is highly equiped and they never ever compromise on quality. So, I would highly recommend other to get treatment from this clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited doctor with severe pain in tooth . I asked him to remove that tooth, but he advised me to do root canal treatment . Doctor did root canal treatment within 30 minutes . My pain subsided and I went away with full satisfaction . Thankyou to doctor jalal & sahas dental team .
*** **** ****** * **** **** *********** ****  wonderful ambience . The doctor was very friendly and caring . They provided exxellent service .

reply_text: Thank you lakshmi mam for your valuable feedback.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It's really happy to find a doctor who make you feel like a person next door, easy to approach, listening to our trouble and getus the best solution. The time he takes to fix the issue, the multiple follow ups he makes to ensure the effect during and post completion of the treatment is great üëçüèª

I am glad that I found dr jalal and sahas dental team , I walked in with zero knowledge of oral care. They explained me each and every step which I am in need of , long ago they just removed my tooth and I was not able to eat properly found very difficult. Finally I met doctor jalal and replaced that place with implant . I have completed procedure . Now I feel very happy and pleasing .
